metadata.title: CVE-2023-35829 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.2. A use-after-free was found in rkvdec_remove in drivers/staging/media/rkvdec/rkvdec.c.

notes.note: cache-use-only> requires root for driver removal or physical access

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
